attributes.action: Reverse the decision to delay the Mayoral and other Local Elections until 2028.
attributes.background:
Reverse the undemocratic decision to delay the 2026 Mayoral and Local Elections by 2 years until 2028. This is undemocratic.

We want this debated by MPs in the House of Commons and asking the government to reverse the decision to delay local and mayoral elections.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751384
